Exceptions¶

Here you can check the code on this submodule:

exception fastemplate.exceptions.FastemplateBaseException(status_code: int, message: str, name: str)[source]¶

API Base exception

Cart¶

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.CartIdAlreadyExistsException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever cart id already exists.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.CartIdNotFoundException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever cart id does not exist.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.InvalidTokenException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever header credentials are invalid.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.ItemAlreadyAddedException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever a cart’s item already exists.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.ItemNotFoundException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever a cart’s item is not found.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.MismatchedLenghtException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever a list has more/less items then prices, and vice versa.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.cart.UnsupportedFileExtensionException(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever a list has more/less items then prices, and vice versa.

User¶

exception fastemplate.exceptions.user.InvalidAuthCredentials(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever request has the correct token but invalid username or password.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.user.InvalidUsernameOrPassword(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever user credentials are wrong.

exception fastemplate.exceptions.user.NiceTryMeowNowGoBack(message: str)[source]¶

Thrown whenever my cat tries to login as owner.

Handler¶

fastemplate.exceptions.handler.exceptions_handler(app)[source]¶

API exceptions handler.

Parameters

app (FastAPI) – the main app
